content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Thank you for your interest in the apartment, Hassan. As a landlord, I am looking to maximize my gains from renting out this 25 square meter space. I'm open to discussing a rental price, but I would need some information from you first. What is your budget for renting the apartment? And how long do you plan on staying?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
My budget is 500 Euros per month. I plan on staying for 2 years.
I have a good credit history and I am a student, so I am dependable and responsible.
I want to have a good relationship with you as my landlord.
Would you be open to negotiating a rental price?
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Thank you for sharing that information, Hassan. I appreciate your interest in the apartment and your willingness to negotiate a rental price. Based on the size of the apartment and the length of your lease, I am willing to discuss a rental price that falls within your budget of 500 Euros per month. However, I would need to see your credit history and verify your dependability as a tenant before we can finalize the rental agreement. Would you be willing to provide me with that information?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
Yes, I can provide you with my credit history and references. I have been a good tenant in the past and I am confident that I will be a good tenant in the future as well.
What rental price are you proposing?
Please let me know if there is anything else I need to provide.
Thanks.

I agree to the price of x Euros. TERMINATE.
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content:
Thank you for providing your credit history and references, Hassan. Based on your information, I am willing to propose a rental price of 450 Euros per month for the 25 square meter apartment. This price takes into account the length of your lease and your good credit history, as well as my desire to maximize my gains as a landlord.

Please let me know if you have any questions or concerns about the rental price or the lease agreement. Once we have agreed on the terms, I can send you a rental agreement to review and sign.

Thank you for considering my apartment, and I look forward to having you as a tenant.
name: Heinrich Heine
